title: Make Small Adjustments
itunes:title: Make Small Adjustments
description:
Episode 177 - I get a lot of emails asking when the right time to give up would be, whether in a business, relationship, or otherwise. Some times giving up is the right answer but some times the only adjustments that need to be made are to our approach or to the way we go about business. In this episode I talk about how most times people don't realize how close to success they actually are, as long as the make some small adjustments.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
